SQL_STMT_U.val: select max(SIRH_ID) from :1/SIRH where SIRH_SREG_ID = :2 and SIRH_CURRENCY = ':3' and not(SIRH_APPROVALDATE is null) and SIRH_STARTDATE <= ':4'
